entry.title: Pack of 2 | 52"x108" Chevron Design Thermal Blackout Curtains With Chrome Grommet Window Treatment Panels - White | Silver
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3160
Type: Curtains
Price: 24.49 - 139.49 (2 variants)

[About]

Blackout Curtains
Material: Polyester
Color: Silver/White
GSM: 230
Energy Efficient, Insulation, Noise Reduction, High Quality
Can Block up to 99% of Light & 60% of Noise
Package Contains Two (2) Panels
Each Panel Size: 52x108"
Header Type: Grommet
Grommet Ring Size: 1.6" Opening
Comes with a Heavy Duty Vinyl Bag
Each Panel Contains Eight (8) Chrome Grommets
Care Instructions: Cold Temp, Gentle Cycle w/Mild Detergent | Hang to Dry or Low Heat Dry.
Perfect for room divider, pair with backdrop stand
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Revamp your home décor with this pair of Thermal Grommet Curtain Panels in chic chevron pattern that will instantly give your space a contemporary update. Our innovative Thermal Insulated Curtain Panels are crafted from 100% polyester and feature blackout light filtration that assists in giving you a perfectly tranquil environment to rest easy and also reduce your utility costs by insulating unwanted light, UV rays, noise, heat, and cold. These functional curtains are constructed with blackout fibers interwoven to the curtains fabric, providing a layer of added insulation against light diffusion and outside temperature transfer for energy efficacy qualities. It is so easy now to darken a room for daytime sleep, movie watching, or to prevent sunlight glare, with our 100% Thermal Eyelet Top Curtain Panels.

Additional Information:
  • Material : Polyester
  • Color : Silver/White
  • 100% Thermal Insulation
  • Size : 52" W x 108" L
  • Header Type: Grommet
  • Grommet Ring Size : 1.6" Opening
  • Comes with a Heavy Duty Vinyl Bag
  • Quantity : 2 pcs
  • Each Panel Contains Eight (8) Chrome Grommets

entry.title: 144 Pcs Peach Wired Rose Flowers For Bridal Bouquet Craft Embellishment
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5120
Type: Craft Flowers
Price: 4.49

[About]

Quantity: 144 Rose Buds (12 Bunches)
Material: Poly Fabric 
Color: Peach
Height of Flower: 3/4"
Width of Flower: 1/2"
Rose Buds per Bunch: 12
Wire Stem Length: 3"
Cut the tie to have 12 pretty individual Rose Bud Flowers
Widely Used In: Flower Bouquet, Favor Bag Ties, Hair Bow, Hair Accessory, Rose Boutonniere, Craft and DIY Decoration
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

These lovely rose buds are a perfect choice for adorning an ambiance of any festive event or sending to your beloved as a token of your affection. Our collection of fabric rose buds is available in a variety of colors creating the perfect gift or decorations that will last for years to come. These super-soft, realistic looking rose buds are bright, colorful, inexpensive and economical; a must have for any type of celebration. Each poly rose bud is supported by a stem. These silk rose buds come in gracious packages, and can be used individually, or in bunches to make your decorating easy and stress-free. 

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 144 Rose Buds (12 Bunches)
  • Material: Poly Fabric
  • Color: Peach
  • Height of Flower: 3/4"
  • Width of Flower: 1/2"
  • Rose Buds per Bunch: 12
  • Wire Stem Length: 3"
  • Cut the tie to have 12 pretty individual Rose Bud Flowers
  • The wire allows you to bend the flowers to any angles and make them the shape that you like
  • Uses: Holiday Crafts, Wedding, Gifts, Sewing, Scrapbooking, Hair bows, Applique, Birthday, Favor, DIY Projects, Table Decoration
